title: Signature Design by Ashley Alliston Faux Leather Upholstered Tufted Loveseat, Brown
features: CONTEMPORARY LOVESEAT: Create a modern vibe in your living room with a piece of furniture that's equal parts comfy and stylish. This loveseat is a showstopper with its bold chocolate brown finish
DEEP CUSHIONED COMFORT: Indulge on high-resiliency foam cushions wrapped in sumptuous faux leather upholstery. Supported by a corner blocked frame and exposed feet in a faux wood finish
ALL IN THE DETAILS: Subtle tufting, the appearance of weathered leather and thickly padded arms create a high-end vibe that feels just as cozy as it looks
PERFECT SOFA COMPANION: Measuring 71” W x 39” D x 38” H, this loveseat pairs so well with a couch or accent chair
ARRIVES ASSEMBLED: Ready for instant enjoyment in your home. Fits through doorways 32" or wider
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget
description: Whether you're a bit tight on living space or you simply want an excuse to get closer, it's easy to See how the Allison Loveseat might be the ideal fit. With its durable upholstery, it provides the appearance of weathered leather, along with subtly tufted detailing, a supportive back and padded arms. The result: comfort and style that go hand in hand.
